title: 24H自助報到說明
content_en: Dear Guest, thank you for choosing Ximen Garden Inn. We provide a 24-hour self-check-in kiosk on the 3rd floor. Please follow the steps: 1. Enter Booking ID or Name 2. Scan ID/Passport 3. Enter E-mail 4. Complete payment 5. Collect your key card. If you encounter any issues, please dial 13 on the phone next to the kiosk. Address: 3F, No. 90, Sec. 1, Zhonghua Rd, Wanhua District, Taipei City.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，感謝您選擇喜園旅館。本館於 3 樓提供 24 小時自助報到機，操作步驟：1. 輸入訂單編號或姓名 2. 掃描證件/護照 3. 填寫電子信箱 4. 完成付款 5. 領取房卡。若有問題，請撥打機器旁電話 13 聯繫客服。地址：台北市萬華區中華路一段90號3樓。
note: 📍 必發：地址與報到機流程

title: 提早入住/晚退房收費
content_en: Dear Guest, regarding your request: Our check-in is at 15:00 and check-out is by 12:00. Early check-in or late check-out is subject to room availability on the day. The fee is NTD 300 per hour per room. Please provide your name and booking ID if you wish to proceed with this request.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，關於您的需求：本館標準入住為 15:00，退房為 12:00。提早入住或延後退房需視當日房況而定，費用為每小時 NTD 300。若需此服務，請提供您的姓名與訂單編號以便備註。

title: 行李寄放規範
content_en: We provide free luggage storage on your check-in and check-out dates only. Please keep your valuables with you, as we are not responsible for any loss. Luggage kept for more than two days without prior notice may be disposed of. Thank you for your cooperation.
content_tw: 本館提供入住/退房當日的免費行李寄放服務。貴重物品請務必隨身攜帶，本館不負保管責任。若行李存放超過兩天且未事先告知，館方將逕行處理。

title: 全館禁菸與無備品規範
content_en: Ximen Garden Inn is a 100% non-smoking hotel. To support environmental protection, we DO NOT provide disposable toiletries (e.g., toothbrushes, toothpaste, razors). Guests must bring their own. We only provide towels and hair dryers. No bidet toilets are available in the building.
content_tw: 喜園旅館為全館禁菸。為響應環保，本館「不提供」一次性個人備品（如牙刷、牙膏、刮鬍刀），請務必自備。我們僅提供毛巾與吹風機。此外，全館皆無免治馬桶。

title: 寵物入住規定
content_en: Pets are allowed with a surcharge of NTD 500 per pet per night. Pets must be on a leash in public areas and are not to be left alone in the room at any time. Hotel towels are for human use only. We appreciate your cooperation.
content_tw: 寵物入住每隻每晚加收 NTD 500 清潔費。在公共區域請繫牽繩，嚴禁將寵物單獨留在房內。館內毛巾不可供寵物使用。感謝您的配合。

title: 一般接機服務費率
content_en: We provide airport pickup service (TPE to Hotel): Small car (4 pax): NTD 1500 / Large van (8 pax): NTD 2000. Night surcharge (23:00-06:00): +NTD 200. Please provide: Date, Flight No., Arrival Time (AM/PM), and Number of Pax/Luggage to book.
content_tw: 本館提供桃園機場接機：小車 (4人) NTD 1500 / 大車 (8人) NTD 2000。深夜加成 (23:00-06:00) 需外加 NTD 200。預訂請提供：日期、航班編號、抵達時間 (AM/PM) 及人數/行李數。

title: 2026過年接送機收費
content_en: CNY Special Rate (Feb 11 - Feb 22, 2026). Pickup: Small NTD 1800 / Large NTD 2300. Drop-off: Small NTD 1500 / Large NTD 2000. Surcharges apply for night service. Full flight details are required for booking.
content_tw: 2026 過年期間 (2/11-2/22) 特殊費率。接機：小車 1800 / 大車 2300；送機：小車 1500 / 大車 2000。夜間時段需另計加成。預訂請提供完整航班資訊。

title: 加人/備品加收費用
content_en: We do not provide extra beds. Extra person fee: NTD 300 (includes towel/water) or NTD 500 (includes pillow/duvet/towel/water). Extra items: Pillow NTD 100 / Duvet NTD 300. Please notify the staff if needed.
content_tw: 本館無法加床。加人費用：NTD 300 (含毛巾/水) 或 NTD 500 (含枕頭/棉被/毛巾/水)。額外加領：枕頭 NTD 100、棉被 NTD 300。如有需要請聯繫櫃台。
